attributes.action: ban the sale of childrens pellet guns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as gun crime is a growing fad amongst britains children,i would ask for the prime minister to ban the sale of these pellet guns that almost every child on my street has.pointing them at anybody and everybody that walks past.it only takes for one pellet to hit someone in the eye and their sight may be gone.also these children think they look "hard",so for their safety and ours please ban these so called toy guns
